tvdb: Frank visits a hospitalized Chris and threatens him to keep quiet.  Chris then refuses to identity his attacker to Doree in order to protect her.  Ian tells Karen she must remove The Avatar's shroud to destroy him and she reluctantly agrees.  Frank then surprises Karen in the park.  Livvie flees after shooting Rafe in the back.  Near death, Rafe pledges his eternal love to Alison and reveals the deal he made to retun to her.  Livvie returns just as Rafe proclaims Ali as his one and only true love.  Rafe dies and his body disappears and returns to Heaven, where Ed greets him.  Ali then faces off with Livvie.
